mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (UID, NICKNAME, INTRODUCE, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nickname}, #{introduce}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT A.UID FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.UID != #{uid} AND A.CREATE_DATETIME BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND NOW() ORDER BY ( SELECT COUNT(B.UID) FROM FEED B WHERE A.UID = B.UID ) LIMIT 30
